Sports-or-excercise.label: *Never*: I do not participate in sport activities at all.
*Rarely*: I engage in sport activities occasionally, around once a month.
*Sometimes*: I participate in such activities regularly, around 1-2 times a month.
*Frequently*: I engage in such activities often, around 1-2 times a week.
*Consistently*: I participate in such activities regularly, more than 2 times a week.

Cigarettes.label: *Infrequent*: I smoke occasionally, less than once a day.
*Light Smoker*: I smoke regularly, around 1-5 cigarettes per day.
*Moderate Smoker*: I smoke regularly, around 6-10 cigarettes per day.
*Heavy Smoker*: I smoke regularly, more than 10 cigarettes per day.

Alcohol.label: *Rarely*: I consume alcohol infrequently, on special occasions.
*Occasionally*: I consume alcohol occasionally, but not regularly.
*Regularly (Moderate)*: I consume alcohol regularly, in moderation.
*Regularly (Heavy)*: I consume alcohol regularly, and it's considered heavy drinking.

Hours-of-sleep.label: *0-4 hours*: I typically get very few hours of sleep per night.
*5-6 hours*: I get fewer hours of sleep than recommended.
*7-8 hours*: I get an adequate amount of sleep most nights.
*9-10 hours*: I get more sleep than the average recommended amount.
*10+ hours*: I typically get a very high number of hours of sleep per night.

Daily-diet.label: *Carnivorous*: My diet mainly consists of animal-based products
*Omnivorous with Limited Variety*: I consume both animal and plant-based foods but with limited variety.
*Balanced Omnivore*: I maintain a balanced diet with a mix of animal and plant-based foods.
*Vegetarian/Vegan with Limited Variety*: The majority of my diet is plant-based with limited animal-based products.
*Vegan:* My diet primarily consists of plant-based foods, with no animal-based products.

Fruit-and-vegetables.label: *Rarely*: I seldom consume fruits and vegetables.
*Occasionally*: I consume fruits and vegetables occasionally but not regularly.
*Moderately Often*: I consume fruits and vegetables with moderate frequency.
*Regularly*: I have a consistent intake of fruits and vegetables.
*Frequently*: I consume fruits and vegetables very often, incorporating them into most of my meals.

Diagnosed.label: Respiratory Diseases (e.g., chronic obstructive pulmonary disease)

Mental-health-condition.label: Yes, I have been diagnosed with a mental health condition.
No, I have not been diagnosed with any mental health condition.

Blood-pressure.label: *Hypertension Stage 2*: 140 or higher/90 or higher mmHg

Wellness-programs.label: Yes, I am actively participating in anti-aging or wellness programs.
No, I am not currently participating in any anti-aging or wellness programs.
